text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali receives visiting German Economic Cooperation Minister Carl Dieter Spranger who called for boosting cooperation between the two countries.
- President Ben Ali instructs the Constitutional Democratic Rallye (ruling party) to launch a campaign to support the programme for modernisation of entreprises.
- Important rainfalls in the southern region of the country.
- Public holidays on April 17 and 18 for Eid al-Adha.
- Germany vows support to Tunisia in its development efforts, German Minister for Economic Cooeration Spranger says after meeting President Ben Ali.
- Road accident between a truck and a passenger bus injures 28 people in the Tunis suburb of Ouardia on Thursday.
- Works to extend the Tunis-Carthage airport capacity from 3 million passengers to 4.5 million passengers expected to be completed by April 1998.
